title: Match History.com bug, 404 player not found
body: When viewing my last few matches its fine, but as soon as i scroll down to load more, it gives me the error, and as soon as i try search for a specific game using the various options it also gives me the error. is there a way to fix it ?

replies.body:
Other people are also getting this. Match History is still in beta, remember that.

Also, last year there was a bug with it where games weren't being saved. This could be an artifact of that.
